title: [Large-Scale] E-Learning Social Sector Expert Development Program Using Polyphonic Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Learners perform collaborative problem-solving in multi-learning environments, moving between physical and virtual spaces. Flexible learning participation using personal devices and project-based assessment are emphasized.

learning_goals: Learners can integrate physical/virtual spaces in polytopic learning environments to produce analytical reports on social issues.
Learners can achieve 100% submission of asynchronous team project deliverables using a Learning Management System (LMS) and collaboration tools.
Learners can propose at least three optimal learning strategies for real-world social science scenarios based on multi-learning space experiences.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
